divine_action.healing_blossom.decorate_s: Decorate a shrine with 18 unique flowers
divine_action.healing_blossom.grow_ambro: Convert a Berry Bush into an Ambrosia Bush
divine_action.healing_touch.bless_shrine: Bless a shrine with a Divine Phial
divine_action.healing_touch.heal_mob_to_: Heal any non-hostile mob to full
divine_action.healing_touch.use_blessed_: Heal your wounds with Blessed Bandages.
guide.DECEPTION.purge_magic.boss_lore: This is good progress. This won't hurt anyone, but this should be a super effective a way to dispel my enemies spells in a pinch.
guide.DECEPTION.purge_magic.lore: I've learned to excel in sneaking, but when I'm caught, I'm finding my self too vulnerable. I need to find a way to turn the tides, and quick.
guide.DECEPTION.shadowbond.boss_lore: Well that has done the trick! As soon as they passed the traps, I swapped places with them. Let's just hope they don't track me down.
guide.DECEPTION.shadowbond.lore: Someone has requested my help turning them invisible so they can sneak into a jungle temple's vault. If only I could reverse our roles...
guide.DIVINE.healing_blossom.boss_lore: I managed to grow a new kind of flower by imbuing one with some of my Divine energy. I can feel it emitting a healing aura when I'm around.
guide.DIVINE.healing_blossom.lore: The Divines didn't just make sentient creatures, but also plants. I wonder if my borrowed power can be used for flora.
guide.DIVINE.healing_touch.boss_lore: It works perfectly. After sustaining an attack, self inflicted or otherwise, I can channel the Divine energy to heal myself.
guide.DIVINE.healing_touch.lore: The power of the Divines is one in which harm to living creatures is seen as a sin. Does that mean I can use this power for the opposite?
guide.RUIN.electric_charge.boss_lore: I'm certain this will work... This spell should be able to start building up shock charge on my target before they knew what hit them.
guide.RUIN.electric_charge.lore: I don't think I'm powerful enough to take people head on right now. I need to give my self an advantage before the fight starts.
guide.RUIN.shattering_crystal.boss_lore: All it came down to was the right element. Using the Frost's innate power to slow things down, I can delay the burst for as long as I want
guide.RUIN.shattering_crystal.lore: My attacks are becoming too predictable. I wonder if I can make a spell with a delayed attack. No one will see it coming!
guide.RUIN.solar_ray.boss_lore: I was mistaken... This spell isn't channelling energy from the sun, but a Sun God! That's definitely a being I never want to run into again.
guide.RUIN.solar_ray.lore: I have purchased this spell tome from a Spell Broker as I have been unable to decipher its origin but I believe its siphoning energy from the sun.
guide.RUIN.storm_rift.boss_lore: I think I went a little overboard... The strength of the storm vortex was so strong, it ripped through space!
guide.RUIN.storm_rift.lore: I started experimenting with Shock spells by forming small storms in front of me. With all my new found knowledge, how powerful can I make that?
guide.RUIN.stormstrike.boss_lore: AHAHAHA I DID IT! By focusing my energy in front of me, I can release the current inside to fire out a lightning bolt
guide.RUIN.stormstrike.lore: The magic flowing inside me is fast, almost like an electric current in my veins. I think I have an idea for a new attack.
guide.SUMMONS.wild_mushroom.boss_lore: Why did I think going to the home of a notably durable fungi would be a good idea. It always knows where I am... Must be these damn spores.
guide.SUMMONS.wild_mushroom.lore: Fungi are some of the most resilient living organisms. If I can find a mushroom infested realm, just think of the power it could be hiding.
guide.TRANSFIGURATION.mystic_armor.boss_: Well, I was trying to make myself absorb their mana. While that didn't completely work, I have managed to reduce the impact of their spells.
guide.TRANSFIGURATION.mystic_armor.lore: Uh oh, seems like I have angered a few too many Magi. I'm trying to throw together whatever I can, hoping I can protect my self a little more consistently.
guide.TRANSFIGURATION.shadow_gate.boss_l: I think I got it! After experimenting with ender pearls, I found I can use them to rip open gateways temporarily. I have created a spell to keep these open for longer.
guide.TRANSFIGURATION.shadow_gate.lore: As my studies have advanced, I am finding myself needing to explore more biomes. I've found that teleportation could be quite useful.
guide.TRANSFIGURATION.stride.boss_lore: Well, I solved my problem with Transfiguration. You won't believe it, but by mixing the right ingredients, I can supercharge my body. Allowing my legs to work even faster!
guide.TRANSFIGURATION.stride.lore: I have been trying to gather ingredients for all of my alchemy rituals, but it's taking me too long to find everything. I need a faster way...
guide.basic.arcanthus: A magical flower found in small patches in flower fields, Arcanthus is the easiest way for a Magi to introduce oneself to the world of magic. Can be crafted into magic essence.
guide.basic.armor: Enchanted regalia that buffs certain spell stats from the corresponding path.
guide.basic.blurb: Welcome fellow Magi, to the world of Spellbound! I present to you the first in many books documenting the arcane. Let this book act as your guide, introducing you to the different paths of magic to follow, and the plethora of mysteries to be discovered.
guide.basic.choice_skills: â–ª Choice skills almost entirely change how a spell functions, giving Magi's the option to swap between different implementations of the same spell.
guide.basic.choice_spells: As spells level up, they can be upgraded to become even stronger and more unique to your playstyle. Certain upgrades changes how spells work entirelyâ€”these are called Â§lChoice SpellsÂ§r.
guide.basic.conditional_skills: â–ª Conditional skills require specific conditions to be met to either unlock or use.
guide.basic.deception: Deception is the path of illusions and trickery. Masters of the art of Deception make their moves from the shadows, striking when you least expect. It is said that there is a place beyond mortal reach, housing secrets for those determined enough to uncover them.
guide.basic.description1: The magical world of Spellbound puts an emphasis on your choices to craft your experience, rather than relying on RNG.
guide.basic.description2: Unlock powerful spells, each with their own set of unique upgrades. Fight dangerous foes in otherworldly dimensions. Explore the dark arts or become a peaceful saint. Choose your path.
guide.basic.divine: Divine is the path of light and darkness. Aid your allies and smite the undead, or curse your enemies and steal their life force. The Divine forces fuel your power, but beware. For every action taken, judgement will be passed.
guide.basic.guide_books: Guide Books are essential for any Magi, new or old. Within them contains all information relevant to its corresponding path. Some content includes:
guide.basic.guide_books6: Note: Not all content has been added yet
guide.basic.magic_essence: Magic Essence is the core of all magic items in this world, utilizing the magical properties of Arcanthus to enhance its host object.
guide.basic.mana_tear: As you and your spells grow stronger, the mana needed to cast them is increased. Mana Tears can be used to permanently increase mana reserves.
guide.basic.modifier_skills: â–ª Modifier skills give permanent buffs/debuffs to certain spell stats, such as duration, potency, or mana cost.
guide.basic.page_scraps1: Path books hold key information about spell acquisition and path mechanics, but are encrypted in a magical language and need a cipher to read.
guide.basic.page_scraps2: Page scraps can be obtained around the world through various actions, deciphering certain entries in a book.
guide.basic.page_scraps3: Explore the lands, interact with mobs, and be on the look out for clues to unlock every book entry.
guide.basic.path_items: Every path has a set of specific items that will help Magi's grow stronger: Â§lShardsÂ§r, Â§lStavesÂ§r, and Â§lArmorÂ§r
guide.basic.ruin: Ruin is the path of elemental energy, destruction and chaos. The Ruin path can be broken down into additional sub-paths: Â§lFireÂ§r, Â§lFrostÂ§r, and Â§lShockÂ§r. Each path has a unique effect that is applied to targets after taking enough damage.
guide.basic.shards: Shards are special magic catalyst items that can be found underground, dropped from certain mobs, or earned from specific tasks.
guide.basic.skills1: Skills are upgrades unique to each spell that adds additional functionality to it. All spells have a total of 10 skill upgrades.
guide.basic.skills2: Skills are unlocked via Skill Points, which are earned every time you level up a spell. Spells can level up to a max level of 5, meaning only 5 of the 10 upgrades can be unlocked.
guide.basic.skills3: There are 3 special types of skills: Â§lModifierÂ§r, Â§lConditionalÂ§r, and Â§lChoiceÂ§r skills.
guide.basic.spell_broker: Located in a secluded tower in the forest and sometimes seen roaming the lands is a shady fellow, the Spell Broker.
guide.basic.spell_broker1: Carrying spells he could only have obtained through suspicious means, the Broker seeks to trade things of magical value.
guide.basic.spell_mastery: All spells are locked under a Mastery Level. Path Mastery Level is increased by levelling up spells, which can be done through spell casting and harming/healing entities with your spells.
guide.basic.spell_paths1: All spells are broken up into 5 spell paths: Â§4RuinÂ§r, Â§2TransfigurationÂ§r, Â§1SummonsÂ§r, Â§eDivineÂ§r, and Â§9DeceptionÂ§r
guide.basic.spell_tomes: To learn a spell, you must first obtain its Spell Tome. Spell Tomes cannot be found in dungeons or as common mob loot, but are instead acquired through certain tasks corresponding to its path.
guide.basic.staves: A Magi's Staff allows its user to better control the flow of magic, bestowing a special buff to spells of the corresponding path.
guide.basic.summons: Summons is the path creation. As a Summoner, bring forth allies from beyond the grave or other dimensions to fight in your stead by defeating them in combat. Befriend familiars to aid you in your journey.
guide.basic.transfiguration: Transfiguration is the path of alchemy and change. Offering a variety of utility and protection, Transfiguration spells are essential in almost all Magi's arsenal. Learn how to perform spells on an even grander scale through rituals.
guide.basic.workbench1: A Magi's Workbench is a Magi's most important tool for spell growth. This is where you can view, swap out, and upgrade your spells as you progress through the world.
guide.deception.acquisition1: How am I to learn this damn path when I can't even begin to find these books. I could ask around, but what if they lie? I must be cautious...
guide.deception.acquisition2: FINE! I caved in and bought some spells from a Spell Broker. But you can bet I'm going to try these on someone else first!
guide.deception.description1: Deceit, trickery, fraud... All words of power to fool those who would doubt you. Using this path of magic I will twist what people see, manipulating what they understand as truth.
guide.deception.description2: This discipline demands a new kind of sightâ€”one that sees through the world's lies to weave falsehoods of my own
guide.deception.quote: Honor is a shackle. Break it.
guide.divine.cover_page: This book shall document my discoveries throughout my adventures into the arcane and how I can call upon divine forces to aid myself and allies and harm foes.
guide.divine.description1: The Divine Path is the discipline of miracles, drawing power from the absolute forces of not only Light, but Darkness. This magic is not learnedâ€”it is bestowed.
guide.divine.description2: To walk this path is to become a conduit for higher powers. Whether you seek to be a Saint of Mercy who shields the weak, or a Paladin of Darkness who has fallen to the forces of evil, this path demands action.
guide.divine.divine_action1: Guarded by the Valkyr, the Shrine is bound to the temple. Should I attempt to mine or displace the altar, the Valkyrâ€™s wrath will be immediate. I may use the Shrine where it stands, but I am forbidden from taking it.
guide.divine.divine_action2:
Like the Valkyr, the shrine too seems to measure my Judgement. If my Judgement does not meet the specific requirement for a spell, the altar remains dormantâ€”
denying me the power until my nature aligns with its intent.
guide.divine.divine_shrine1: The Divine Shrine is the heart of this magic, yet it functions unlike any other altar I have encountered. It does not desire materials; it desires proof.
guide.divine.divine_shrine2: I have learned that spells are not made, but granted. To acquire them, I must perform specific Divine Actions within the Shrine's presence.
guide.divine.divine_temple1: I have discovered these mysterious, looming structures along my travels. Scattered across the lands are Divine Temples, ancient structures built to worship the Divine.
guide.divine.judgement1: I used to think this magic was merely a tool, indifferent to the hand that wielded it. I was wrong. It is watching me.
guide.divine.judgement2: I noticed the shift recently. After spending days protecting the weak, my benevolent magic surged, becoming far more potent than before. Yet, out of curiosity, when I turned to cruelty, that warmth withered. In its place, my darker arts flared with a terrifying, violent heat.
guide.divine.judgement3: There is a hidden balance at playâ€”a Â§lJudgement.
guide.divine.judgement4: It seems my soul is constantly being weighed. Acts of light tip the scales, amplifying my ability to preserve life but suffocating my ability to take it. Acts of darkness tip them back, fueling my darker arts while severing my connection to the light.
guide.divine.judgement5: This invisible score dictates everything. Forbidden knowledge remains locked to me until my nature aligns with its intent, and even the world itself seems to react to my standing. I must choose my path carefully. I cannot be both a Saint and a Monster. The Scales will not allow it.
guide.divine.quote: Faith is not spoken. It is proven.
guide.divine.valkyr1: They are not abandoned. Each is protected by a Valkyr, a sentinel of steel and light.
guide.divine.valkyr2: I realized my safety hung by a thread. These guardians serve the balance of Judgement. To the righteous, they are silent watchers. But had I approached with a heart stained by cruelty, I have no doubt the Valkyr would have cut me down the moment I crossed the threshold.
guide.ruin.build_up1: I've discovered that a single creatures body can only take so much of each element. When a target is unable to absorb more of an element, their body seems to react in a different way depending on the element. I'll keep experimenting and try to understand what exactly is happening.
guide.ruin.cover_page: This book shall document my discoveries throughout my adventures into the arcane and how I can bend it to my will to destroy my enemies by harnessing the powers of ruin.
guide.ruin.cryomancer_robes: Finally, some Frost robes to protect me from the cold! They were spread between igloos and abandoned shipwrecks.
guide.ruin.description1: The destructive Path of Ruin, channelling the forces that hold the world together and twisting them to tear the world apart.
guide.ruin.description2: To use this path to its fullest is to channel all your mana into pure elemental power, ripping through anyone who stands in your path or doubts your strength. Disregarding whatever damage you may do to the world around you.
guide.ruin.fire:
Â§lFireÂ§r
Fire is the first of the elements I have explored. It appears to have the highest damage and destructive output of the three, being able to set targets aflame.
guide.ruin.fire_status:
Â§lFireÂ§r
Fire energy explodes out the target, dealing massive damage and setting fire to the area around the target.
guide.ruin.frost:
Â§lFrostÂ§r
Like the other side of a coin, Frost is the opposite of Fire. this one seems to affect living creatures ability to perform actions massively slowing any thing affected by it.
guide.ruin.frost_status:
Â§lFrostÂ§r
Freezes foes solid, stopping them from performing any actions temporarily.
guide.ruin.path_items: I have discovered elemental attuned robes and staves throughout the world. As far as I can tell, these staves act as a catalyst for their respective element, causing those who I target to reach Elemental Overload faster. The robes, on the other hand, seems to increase the potency of my spells when I wear the full set.
guide.ruin.portals1: When I draw from this source of magic, I can feel others tug back at it. I believe there are ancient beings residing in their own realms that have learned to bend these elements to their will.
guide.ruin.portals2: I aim to find the gateways to these ancient beings' realms so I can find how they are twisting the elements and create new ways of expressing my own magic.
guide.ruin.portals3: While exploring I have found a few gateways, but they seem to all be locked. Unfortunately, the way to make keystones has been long forgotten. I'l have to buy my ruin spells from Spell Brokers for now.
guide.ruin.pyromancer_robes: Exploring the nether, I spotted these robes hot to the touch. With this kind of heat, I imagine Fire spells won't get through very well.
guide.ruin.quote: Peace is a lie. There is only energy.
guide.ruin.shock:
Â§lShockÂ§r
The final element, Shock, possesses the most chaotic and rapid nature of the three, chaining lightning and creating storm clouds at will. From what I've gathered, the shock can disrupt some enemiesâ€”hindering their spell casting abilities.
guide.ruin.shock_status:
Â§lShockÂ§r
Targets access to the arcane is disrupted, silencing them temporarily and draining their mana.
guide.ruin.stormweaver_robes: Within a trial chamber, I have found these robes belonging to a long forgotten Stormweaver. These robes resist Shock damage to a degree.
guide.ruin.subpaths1: Ruin manipulates the power holding the world together, but there isn't just one force doing this.
guide.ruin.subpaths2: I believe there are 3 primordial elements this power consists of: Â§lFireÂ§r, Â§lFrostÂ§r and Â§lShockÂ§r. They all seem to have a different impact on both the world and my magic. If I focus my studies on one Sub-Path, it's possible I could enhance my control over one of these forces exponentially.
guide.summon.description1: Summoning magic... dragging creatures from the darkest of realms and forcing them to fight on your behalf. Only the strong willed can use this power.
guide.summon.description2: To harness this source of magic, a creature must first be defeated to understand its power. But that first requires reaching into these twisted realms where they reside, and hunting these powerful entities.
guide.summon.dimensions1: The most powerful creatures to exist lord over their own realms. If I am able to find a way to access these dimensions, then I can learn how to control these beasts and use their powers for myself.
guide.summon.dimensions2: I know I can't be the first one to try this I plan to search for any potential portals left by others.
guide.summon.portal_activation1: After focusing more of my studies on End portals, I have realised that I need something else. Maybe I can use a block to focus on to locate their destination.
guide.summon.portal_activation2: I believe that if I can create just a single summoning stone adjusted to a specific dimension, I could open a gateway by placing it in the middle of my portal and activating it.
guide.summon.summoning_portal1: I have come across a crumbling structure with these summoning stones arranged like an End portal. They seem to be activated with Magic Essence.
guide.summon.summoning_stone1: Within the nether I have found some abandoned forges. Within the rubble was this recipe for a summoning stone.
guide.summon.valid_portals: Well, after a series of trial and error, I have found that these focused summoning stones must be very specific.
guide.summon.valid_portals1: When I am able to find a way to create a new focused stone I will be sure to note it down in this book, along with any information regarding the spells I can draw out from the dimension.
guide.summons.cover_page: This book shall document my discoveries throughout my adventures into the arcane and how I can increase my strength through numbers with the rites of summoning.
guide.summons.quote: Death is not the end. It's the beginning of recruitment.
guide.transfiguration.chalk: I discovered some runic marking on the walls in the caves. I don't understand what they mean, but it's almost as if I felt magic flowing through the text. I'll write some down for later.
guide.transfiguration.cover_page: This book shall document my discoveries throughout my adventures into the arcane and how I can manipulate the world around me through the study of transfiguration.
guide.transfiguration.description1: Matter, equivalent exchange, logicâ€”the Transfiguration Path requires great understanding of these concepts. It's more than magicâ€”it's a science.
guide.transfiguration.description2: To truly master this path is to reject the world as it appears. Stone can become water, iron can become gold, and a formidable enemy can become a harmless sheep. But to rewrite the laws of physics, you must understand them first.
guide.transfiguration.display: I've been chiseling away at these old magic stones for hours. My body aches, but at least I have a way to store my collection of materials
guide.transfiguration.pedestal: I infused a little bit of my magic into an rickety table I had lying around in preparation for my studies. And now I have itâ€”the heart of the altar, where the magic happens.
guide.transfiguration.quote: Reality is not a rule. It is a suggestion
guide.transfiguration.ritual_talisman: I have everything in place to begin my experiment, but nothing is happening. Maybe I need a catalyst? I should be waryâ€”if it isn't strong enough, it could be a waste.
guide.transfiguration.rituals1: Alchemy, the foundation of everything I do. Whether I am extracting a new spell formula or manipulating my environment, the process is the same: arrange the geometry, balance the components, and force the transmutation.
guide.transfiguration.rituals2: The apparatus appears to consists of a central pedestal surrounded by display stands, with each tier increasing the displays and height needed.
guide.transfiguration.robes: Continuing on with my experimentation, I have succeeded in designing a set of robes. The fabric traps some of the residual magical energy lost from casting, increasing the duration of my Transfiguration spells while wearing them.
guide.transfiguration.rune_circuit: If I connect the displays in a ring with these runic symbols I found, the structure acts as a circuit, with the items on displays defining the properties of the ritual.
guide.transfiguration.stave: In my studies, I've theorized a specialized catalyst that can be tuned to my Transfiguration spells. One that acts as a lens, extending the reach of my magic. To forge this, I must devise a new ritual. If my theories are correct, I'll document the results here.
healing_blossom.decorate_shrine.lore: As I grow in tune with the divine, I can feel a strong presence of magic emanating from Overworld flora. I should collect as much as I can to study.
healing_blossom.decorate_shrine.name: Gardener
healing_blossom.grow_ambrosia_bush.lore: It seems bees fail to see me as an enemy after I've eaten this Ambrosia dish. While helpful, it's not really my taste. I'll just give some to the bees since they seem to like it.
healing_blossom.grow_ambrosia_bush.name: Living Pollen
healing_blossom.purify_wither_rose.lore: I can sense a sinister aura coming from this black flower. As a servant of the Divine, it is my duty to cleanse it!
healing_blossom.purify_wither_rose.name: Life From Death
healing_touch.bless_shrine.lore: This shrine I found in the temple seems to resonate with my every actionâ€”good or bad. I think as long as I take good care of it, I can become even stronger!
healing_touch.bless_shrine.name: Caretaker
healing_touch.heal_mob_to_full.lore: I'm still rather new to this whole healing magic thing, it might be best to start off small. I wonder if I can catch any animals to practice on?
healing_touch.heal_mob_to_full.name: Shepherd
healing_touch.use_blessed_bandages.lore: This world is harsh... ferocious wildlife and undead monsters are running rampant. It will be a serious problem without a way to heal my wounds in a pinch
healing_touch.use_blessed_bandages.name: Field Medic
ritual.spellbound.create_mystic_armor.de: Creates a Mystic Armor spell tome
ritual.spellbound.create_shadow_gate.des: Creates a Shadow Gate spell tome
skill.description.spellbound.accelerated: Instantly restores 2 hunger to the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.afterglow: Enemies hit are marked with a glow for 5 seconds. While marked, they take 20% extra fire damage.
skill.description.spellbound.alternating: The discharge has a small chance to instantly kill the target. Does not work on target with more than twice the caster's current health. On failure, the caster takes damage equal to 5% of their max health.
skill.description.spellbound.amplify: Electric Charge can be held for 3 seconds to increase the damage up to 100%.
skill.description.spellbound.aqua_tread: Gain the ability to walk on water.
skill.description.spellbound.arcane_veng: Increases attack damage by 15% for 10 seconds after you block an attack.
skill.description.spellbound.aversion: Counter Magic reflects 100% of the spell damage back to the attacker.
skill.description.spellbound.bait_and_sw: Enemies passing through a portal take 5 damage to health and mana.
skill.description.spellbound.blasphemy: When the caster is hit, applies Disease to the attacker for 3 seconds. 5 sec. cooldown
skill.description.spellbound.blinding_li: Enemies hit by the beam are blinded for 3 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.blink: Passing through the portals increases the caster's movement speed for 25 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.bloom: The blossom now activates immediately after casting.
skill.description.spellbound.burst_of_li: Instantly heals the caster 4 health upon activation.
skill.description.spellbound.cats_agilit: In cat form, the spirit gains increased movement speed.
skill.description.spellbound.chain_react: The discharge applies Electric Charge to all nearby enemies, including the caster. The secondary charge is discharged immediately.
skill.description.spellbound.chaotic_sha: Detonating one crystal will detonate others in the area.
skill.description.spellbound.charged_atm: Decreases shock-based Ruin spells' mana costs by 25% for 8 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.charged_rif: Each warp between portals charges the storm, increasing shock damage 1 up to a max of 5.
skill.description.spellbound.chill: Crystal passively emits a freezing aura, dealing frost damage every second.
skill.description.spellbound.cleansing_t: Removes a random negative effect from the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.combat_perc: Chance to dodge a melee attack.
skill.description.spellbound.concentrate: After 5 seconds of hitting the same target, the damage doubles.
skill.description.spellbound.conjure_cat: Summons a totem spirit for 60 seconds. It changes between warrior form (fighting stance) and cat form (healing stance).
skill.description.spellbound.convalescen: Restores 1 health when the caster attacks a target affected by poison or disease.
skill.description.spellbound.counter_mag: (Choice) Gain a magic shield that negates any spell cast on the caster for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.crystal_ech: After detonation, the crystal reforms in its original location for 10 seconds (once per crystal).
skill.description.spellbound.darkness_pr: Portals can be spawned in any light level.
skill.description.spellbound.disarm: Chance to disarm the target each damage tick.
skill.description.spellbound.disoriented: After the swap, the target gets dizzy and deals 20% less damage for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.displacemen: A single portal can now teleport enemies to a random location within 10 blocks.
skill.description.spellbound.divine_bala: Increases the duration of the spell by 100% and the mana cost by 50%.
skill.description.spellbound.dual_destin: Can now deploy an additional portal. Order of travel goes by order placed.
skill.description.spellbound.eldritch_in: Restores caster's health to 50% if it drops below 20%. 2 min. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.electric_ch: Sneakily apply an electric charge to the target. Recast to discharge.
skill.description.spellbound.envenom: Spores now poison targets for 4 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.equilibrium: When you get hit, deals damage equal to 10% of your total health back to the attacker.
skill.description.spellbound.eternal_spr: The healing duration is increased to 15 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.event_horiz: When a target is warped, they pull nearby enemies towards the warp field.
skill.description.spellbound.everlasting: Increases the duration of invisibility to 20 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.explosive_b: Each lava bomb explodes on impact.
skill.description.spellbound.expunge: Cast with a fool's shard to remove a spell from the target's knowledge. Can only be used once a day.
skill.description.spellbound.feral_fury: In cat form, the spirit gains increase attack damage and speed.
skill.description.spellbound.fleetfooted: Nearby allies gain 15% movement speed while near the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.flourishing: If the caster's health reaches full, the excess health is converted into 5 points of mana per second.
skill.description.spellbound.flower_fiel: Allies receive half the healing from the blossom.
skill.description.spellbound.forced_warp: Upon being warped, targets are launched out of the portal with a high velocity, potentially dealing damage on impact.
skill.description.spellbound.frigid_blas: Enemies hit by the blast are slower by 50% for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.frozen_shra: The crystal now sends out ice shards that deal extra frost damage.
skill.description.spellbound.fungal_harv: When 3 mushrooms are active, gain increased mana regeneration.
skill.description.spellbound.glacial_imp: Recast with a frozen shard to mark a crystal. Marked crystal's explosion applies freeze and Permafrost to enemies hit.
skill.description.spellbound.gravity_shi: Exiting the portal launches entities in the air, applying slow falling to the caster and allies, if applicable.
skill.description.spellbound.hastened_gr: Decreases the explosion interval by 1 second.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_blo: Plants a divine blossom. The blossom blooms 10 seconds after casting and last 10 seconds. The blossom heals the caster 2 health per seconds when within 5 blocks.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_lig: Allies hit by the ray are healed for 2 health per second.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_str: Each tick restores extra health equal to 2% of the caster's missing mana.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_tou: Heals the caster 2 health per second for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.healing_win: The blossom now follows the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.high_voltag: Recast with a storm shard to stun the target for 2 seconds. Enemies that come in range of the target are also stunned. 30 sec. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.hypothermia: Enemies hit by the explosion have their frost resistance reduced by 10% for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.ice_shard: Recast on a crystal: destroy it to make it drop a frozen shard. 1 day cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.implosion: Recast while targeting a portal with a storm shard to detonate the portal, applying Stormstrike to anyone in the area.
skill.description.spellbound.inferno_cor: After the eruption ends, the volcano drops a Smoldering Shard.
skill.description.spellbound.lava_flow: Lava bombs turn into lava pools on impact.
skill.description.spellbound.lingering_f: After detonation, the crystal leaves a damaging mist behind. Enemies caught in the mist for 3 seconds will get frozen.
skill.description.spellbound.living_fung: Recast on a mushroom to spawn a Mini Mushroom minion for 5 minutes.
skill.description.spellbound.living_shad: After the swap, the caster remains invisible for another 5 seconds and leaves behind a decoy for up to 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.magic_poiso: Mana is reduced by 20 points for each active spell purged.
skill.description.spellbound.magnetic_fi: The vortex has twice the pull strength. Enemies caught in the field have their armor reduced by 25%.
skill.description.spellbound.momentum: For each second travelled, your attack speed is increased by 4%, up to a max of 20%, for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.motion_sick: Warped enemies have their movement, attack, and mining speed reduced by 40% for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.mystic_armo: Reduces incoming spell damage by 15% for 60 seconds (+3% per level on the Transfiguration Path, up to 30% max).
skill.description.spellbound.natures_dom: Each active mushroom increases the spell's damage by 10%.
skill.description.spellbound.natures_tou: Instantly restores 4 health to the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.nine_lives: If the spirit is killed, it will instantly revive with 50% health (only once per summoning).
skill.description.spellbound.nullificati: Removes a random enchantment from the target's equipment
skill.description.spellbound.oak_blessin: Increases armor by 15% for 10 seconds if the caster's health drops below 30% while Healing Touch is active. 30 sec. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.observant: The target is outlined to the caster while invisible.
skill.description.spellbound.open_invita: Anyone can pass through the portals.
skill.description.spellbound.orbital_she: Recast while targeting a portal with a shard to mark a portal. Marked portals will move in a 3-block radius circle centered around the origin.
skill.description.spellbound.oscillation: Increases the discharge damage by 5% for each storm shard in the caster's inventory. All shards are destroyed on discharge.
skill.description.spellbound.overgrowth: While at full health, each heal tick applies a stack of Overgrowth (up to a max of 5 stacks). When hit, Overgrowth restores 4 health, consuming 1 stack.
skill.description.spellbound.overheat: After using Solar Ray for 5 seconds, the caster emits intense heat, dealing 3 fire damage per seconds to nearby enemies.
skill.description.spellbound.overpower: Gain the ability to slowly move while casting Solar Ray.
skill.description.spellbound.parasitic_f: Enemies hit by a mushroom explosion are taunted for 3 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.piezoelectr: If killed by Electric Charge, the enemy drops a storm shard. 30 sec. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.planar_defl: Deflects 30% of melee damage taken back to the attacker.
skill.description.spellbound.poison_esse: If a target dies to a mushroom, the spell deals 25% more damage for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.power_of_th: Solar Ray deals 50% more damage during the day.
skill.description.spellbound.primal_resi: In cat form, the spirit's regenerate +5% of its max health.
skill.description.spellbound.proliferati: Mini Mushroom minions can be bonemealed to spawn a Giant Mushroom.
skill.description.spellbound.pulsation: Chance to paralyze the target for 1 second each damage tick.
skill.description.spellbound.purge: Deals extra damage to summoned targets, equal to 10% of the caster's current mana.
skill.description.spellbound.purge_magic: Stops all of the targets active spells.
skill.description.spellbound.quick_recha: The caster receives 20 mana any time someone passes through a portal.
skill.description.spellbound.quick_sprin: For the first 10 seconds, movement speed is increased by an additional 15%.
skill.description.spellbound.radio_waves: Purge Magic is now cast in an AoE.
skill.description.spellbound.reach: Double the range of the portals
skill.description.spellbound.rebirth: Mark a blossom with a holy shard. If the caster takes fatal damage near the blossom, half of their health is automatically restored.
skill.description.spellbound.refraction: When the target takes damage from your shock-based Ruin spells while affected with Stormstrike, restores 15 mana back to the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.residual_di: Targets hit with Purge Magic have a 50% chance to fail spells cast within the next 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.reversal: After the swap, the caster can recast within 5 seconds to swap back with the target.
skill.description.spellbound.riders_resi: All movement benefits are applied to mounts.
skill.description.spellbound.savage_leap: In warrior form, the spirit can perform a leap forward, knocking back all enemies.
skill.description.spellbound.shadow_chai: The spell can now affect an additional target. Swapping order is in the order of targets affected.
skill.description.spellbound.shadow_esca: When the caster enters the portal below 50% health, they gain invisibility for 10 seconds after exiting.
skill.description.spellbound.shadow_gate: Deploy 2 shadow portals (must be in a low light level), allowing passage in both directions with 50 blocks.
skill.description.spellbound.shadow_step: After the swap, the caster's movement speed is increased by 30% for 5 seconds
skill.description.spellbound.shadowbond: Caster and target gain invisibility for 10 seconds. When the invisibility is broken, the caster and target swap places.
skill.description.spellbound.shattering_: Creates a crystal of Ice. Cast again to detonate it, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
skill.description.spellbound.shock_facto: Deals extra damage equal to 1% of your current mana each damage tick.
skill.description.spellbound.silent_exch: After the swap, the target is Silenced for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.snare: After the swap, the target is rooted.
skill.description.spellbound.sneak_attac: After the swap, the caster's first attack within 5 seconds deals 50% more damage.
skill.description.spellbound.solar_bore: The end of the Solar Ray opposite of the caster explodes once per second, setting the ground ablaze.
skill.description.spellbound.solar_burst: Every 3 seconds, both ends of the beam release a small solar burst that deals an additional 3 fire damage around both areas.
skill.description.spellbound.solar_ray: Fire a thin beam of light that deals 5 fire damage per second.
skill.description.spellbound.soul_rechar: Restores you to full health if your health drops below 10%, consuming a filled soul shard in the caster's inventory. 3 min. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.stampede: You can charge through enemies, knocking them back and dealing 3 damage.
skill.description.spellbound.static_shoc: Hitting a block now creates a small explosion that applies Stormstrike to anyone it hits.
skill.description.spellbound.stealth_tac: In cat form, the spirit will turn invisible for 7 seconds if its health drops below 25%. 1 min. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_calle: Generate a cloud above both portals that discharge lightning periodically dealing for 5 shock damage.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_fury: The vortex doubles in size and damage.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_rift: Creates a storm portal for 20 seconds. If two portals are active, those approaching either get warped across and take 5 shock damage to health and mana.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_shard: If the target dies while affected by Stormstrike, the caster is awarded a Storm Shard. 30 sec. cooldown.
skill.description.spellbound.storm_surge: If killed by Electric Charge, 10 to 20 mana is restored to the caster.
skill.description.spellbound.stormstrike: Send out a bolt of lightning that charges a target
skill.description.spellbound.stride: Movement speed is increased by 25% for 30 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.sublime_bea: Restores health equal to 25% of your armor points every 3 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.sunshine: Doubles the range of Solar Ray.
skill.description.spellbound.supercharge: If the target dies while affected by Stormstrike, increases the damage of shock-based Ruin spells by 50% for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.superconduc: Decreases target's shock resistance by 33% for 10 seconds on discharge.
skill.description.spellbound.synthesis: If a target dies to a mushroom, the casting cost of the spell is decreased by 100% for 5 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.thin_ice: Enemies that walk near the crystal will instantly trigger the detonation.
skill.description.spellbound.thorny_vine: Enemies within the range of the blossom take 4 damage per second.
skill.description.spellbound.totemic_arm: In warrior form, the spirit receives an armor buff that reduces physical damage by 25%.
skill.description.spellbound.totemic_bon: The caster receives a portion of the spirit's healing while in cat form.
skill.description.spellbound.twin_spirit: The caster gains the ability to summon a second spirit, allowing for two spirits to fight simultaneously - one in warrior form, the other in cat form.
skill.description.spellbound.unfocused: Reduces the target's spell power by 10% for 20 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.unleashed_s: If killed by Electric Charge, the target will explode dealing half the base shock damage.
skill.description.spellbound.unwanted_gu: Enemies that pass through a portal have their attack and spell damage reduced by 10%.
skill.description.spellbound.verdant_ren: Cleanses all negative effects from the caster
skill.description.spellbound.volcano: Create a volcanic eruption that spits out 8 lava bombs per second for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.warriors_ro: In warrior form, the spirit can let out a roar that increases ally attack damage by 15% for 10 seconds.
skill.description.spellbound.wild_mushro: Plants a wild mushroom at the target location, expelling poisonous spores every 3 seconds, dealing 4 damage to all nearby enemies.
summon.acquisition.description: Use the keystone below to access the boss's dimension.
summon.acquisition.wild_mushroom.lore: Come to think of it, it's rare to see a single mushroom on its own...
